results.headline: LIFE AND TIMES OF ALLEN GINSBERG, THE (MOVIE)
results.display_title: The Life and Times of Allen Ginsberg

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of The Life and Times of Allen Ginsberg

results.summary_short: Jerry Aronson's documentary, first released in 1994. is a look at America's last 50 years through Ginsberg's eyes. This updated version has some new scenes.

results.headline: WOMEN FROM THE LAKE OF SCENTED SOULS (MOVIE)
results.display_title: Women From the Lake of Scented Souls

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Women From the Lake of Scented Souls

results.summary_short: A hard-working Chinese woman sold into marriage achieves success in business, buys a wife for her retarded son and conemplates the culture that limits her life. Gentle and moving.

results.headline: MY GIRL 2 (MOVIE)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of My Girl 2

results.summary_short: She's 13 now and searching for her mother's California dreams. Appealingly sentimental sequel and a valentine to L.A.'s palmier days.
